title: 3D Blueprint Watch Face
summary: Technically drawn 3D watch face for Android Wear.
description: Feel the depth of this 3D blueprint-style watch face.Enjoy synchronously floating layers with every wrist move.Read time with either analog or digital time representation.Battery status included.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
descriptionHTML:
Feel the depth of this 3D blueprint-style watch face.

Enjoy synchronously floating layers with every wrist move.

Read time with either analog or digital time representation.
Battery status included.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.

ATEKTURA Watch Faces on Google+
https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/106084399129186124597/106084399129186124597/posts
comments: Not good on Moto 360 Too much movement sadly knocking a lot of the display off the bottom. No settings to be able to make changes.
